text: [You shudder slightly as you try to aggressively shake off whatever gross crap just got on your shoe.]
[Your eyes follow a line of the disgusting substance that dips into the water.]
[A bunch of other lines of the black goo weave together and meet in the center of the pool.]
[At the apex sat a big black mat.]
[You find yourself stuck in place as something even more unnatural starts to happen.]
[You can feel your heart beating violently against your rib cage as it comes up through the top of the water.]
